text: Police are continuing to investigate a fire at a Waitrose supermarket in Wellington. Staff are today turning away customers. Shoppers have been arriving at the supermarket unaware of the fire at the weekend. Police say it may have been arson.
title: Fire at Waitrose supermarket may have been arson.
